DOC.criteria: Males Females 18‐65 year age Good health determine medical history , physical examination , vital sign , ECG , clinical laboratory measurement ; Body weight 45 kg great , body mass index ( BMI ) ≤ 35 kg/m² ( weight [ kg ] /height [ meter ] ² ) If female , childbearing potential lactation History significant adverse reaction lipid‐lowering agent
